title: Differential clinical outcomes after 3 versus 5 years in a comparison of preoperative chemotherapy with and without radiotherapy in locally advanced rectal cancer: A national cohort propensity score-matched study
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Yuanxin Zhang, Rui Luo, Jingqi Peng, Zichuan He, Delin Tan, Xueping Liu, Hui Wang, Huaiming Wang
